msg
As I said before, this world is your reflection, its change is connected to our body.
如我之前所说，现在的这个世界就是你身体的缩影，一切的变化都与你的身体状态有着必然的因果关系。
昨日言った通り、この世界はあなたの身体の生き写し、全ての変化はあなたの身体の状態とリンクしている。
어제 말했듯이, 이 세계는 당신의 몸의 살아있는 복제품이에요. 모든 변화는 당신의 신체 상태와 연결되어 있죠.
As I said yesterday, this world is a manifestation of your body. All that changes that occur here are linked to your physical state.
As I said before, this world now is a microcosm of your body, and all changes are inevitably causally related to your physical state.
As I said yesterday, this world is a living copy of your body, and all changes are linked to your physical state.
msg
From this logic, when the big Honkai comes again, your body will also be completely eroded, and die in the end.
以这个世界的逻辑来说，当大崩坏将再次降临毁灭一切的时候，在你身体的层面的表现则是被崩坏能完全侵蚀，最终死亡。
この世界に大崩壊が再び訪れることは、現実世界でのあなたの身体が崩壊エネルギーに侵食され、死亡することを意味するわ。
이 세계에 대붕괴가 다시 찾아온다는 것은 현실 세계에서 당신의 몸이 붕괴 에너지에 침식되어 죽음을 의미하죠.
A major Honkai in this world again would mean that your body in the real world would be eroded by the Honkai energy and you would die.

In the logic of this world, when the Great Avalanche will come again to destroy everything, the manifestation at the level of your body is to be completely eroded by the Avalanche energy and eventually die.
A major collapse in this world again would mean that your body in the real world would be eroded by the collapse energy and you would die.
msg
So the only way now, is to prevent the Honkai energy from spreading in your body, to prevent the dead plague from absorbing Honkai energy.
所以现在唯一可行的方法，就是阻止你体内的崩坏能扩散，也就是说阻止这个世界的死斑吸收足够的崩坏能。
だから、それを阻止する唯一の方法は、あなたの体内を侵食する崩壊エネルギーを止めることよ。そうすれば、リンクしているこの世界も崩壊エネルギーがなくなって、死斑もこれ以上吸収できなくなるわ。
그러니까, 그것을 막는 유일한 방법은 당신의 체내를 침식하는 붕괴 에너지를 멈추는 거예요. 그렇게 하면 연결된 이 세계도 붕괴 에너지가 사라져서 사반(死斑)도 더 이상 흡수할 수 없게 되죠.
So now the only viable way to stop the spread of the disintegration energy in your body is to stop the dead spots in this world from absorbing enough disintegration energy.
So the only way to stop it is to stop the decay energy from invading your body. Then this linked world will no longer have decay energy, and the death spots will not be able to absorb any more.

msg

咕…虽然听起来很复杂，但其实我们的目标很简单，因为你体内一切崩坏能的来源都是来自于被吸收的第二律者核心。
えっと……ちょっとややこしく聞こえるかもしれないけど、やることは簡単。あなたを蝕む崩壊エネルギーは、現実世界の体内に宿った第二律者のコアから来ているわ。
음… 좀 복잡하게 들릴지도 모르지만, 할 일은 간단해요. 당신을 잠식하는 붕괴 에너지는 현실 세계의 체내에 깃든 제2 율자의 코어에서 나오는 거예요.

Let's see, ...... It may sound a little complicated, but what you need to do is simple. The Honkai energy that is consuming you is coming from the core of the Second Herrscher that resides in your real-world body.
Goo...as complicated as it sounds, our goal is actually quite simple, because the source of all the disintegration energy in your body comes from the absorbed Second Ruler core.

Let's see, ...... It may sound a little complicated, but what you need to do is simple. The disintegrating energy that is consuming you is coming from the core of the Second Ruler that resides in your real-world body.
portraits
msg
But in reality, the Herrscher core has integrated with you, there's no way to get it apart, but here is different, every concept is represented, I think including the second Herrscher core.
然而在现实中，律者核心已经和你的身体合为一体，无法寻找剥离的方法，但是这里就不同了，在这个世界中所有的概念都被具现化了，我想也包括了第二律者的核心。
現実世界では、あなたの身体とひとつになった律者コアを剥離する方法はないでしょうけど、ここなら違う。この世界のあらゆる概念は、具現化されたもの。つまり、それが第二律者のコアであっても関係ない。
현실 세계에서는, 당신의 몸과 하나가 된 율자 코어를 박리하는 방법은 없겠지만, 여긴 달라. 이 세계의 모든 개념은 구체화된 것. 즉, 그것이 제2율자의 코어라 해도 관계없어.

In the real world, there would be no way to detach the Herrscher Core which has become integrated into your physical body. But not here. Every concept in this world is an embodiment. In other words, it doesn't matter if it is the core of the Second Herrscher.

In reality, however, the Ruler's core has become one with your body and it is impossible to find a way to divest it, but here it is different, in this world all concepts are materialized, including, I think, the core of the Second Ruler.

In the real world, there would be no way to detach the Ruler Core, which is one with your body, but not here. Every concept in this world is an embodiment. In other words, it doesn't matter if it is the core of the Second Ruler.
msg
Remember the Honkai vacuum in Nagazora, I found something weird during the time when Honkai energy starts to grow there.
还记得之前律者攻击之后在长空市内产生的崩坏能真空区么，在那段时间内真空区的崩坏能逐渐恢复的时候我发现了一些异样的地方。
以前、律者に攻撃された時、長空市内で崩壊エネルギーの真空エリアができたのを覚えてる？その時、真空エリア内の崩壊エネルギーが元に戻るまでの間で、ある違和感があったの。
이전에 율자에게 공격당했을 때, 장공시에서 붕괴 에너지의 진공 에어리어가 생겼던 거 기억해? 그때 진공 에어리어 내의 붕괴 에너지가 원래대로 돌아오기까지의 시간 동안, 어떤 위화감이 있었던 거야.
Remember the avalanche energy vacuum created in the city after the previous Ruler attack? I noticed something strange when the avalanche energy in the vacuum gradually recovered during that time.

Do you remember when we were attacked by the Ruler before, a vacuum area of decay energy was created within the city of Nagora? At that time, I felt a certain discomfort while the decay energy in the vacuum area was being restored to its original state.
msg
Theoretically the Honkai energy growth in the vaccum doesn't have a regular pattern, but some area shows higher index than others, I think there must be something releasing Honkai energy there.
按照理论来说真空区内的崩坏能填充并非规律均衡地增长，但是在某些区域却呈现出一些高于平均指标的情况，所以我觉得一定是有某样东西在散发着崩坏能才导致这样的结果。
理論上、真空エリア内に再び崩壊エネルギーが充填されるまで、そのスピードは不規則なものよ。けど、一部のエリアでは平均を上回るスピードで充填がされていたの。理由は、あるものが崩壊エネルギーをまき散らしていたから。
이론상 진공 에어리어에 다시 붕괴 에너지가 충전되는 속도는 불규칙한 거야. 하지만 일부 에어리어에서는 평균을 웃도는 속도로 충전이 되고 있었어. 이유는, 어떤 것이 붕괴 에너지를 흩뿌리고 있었기 때문이야.

According to the theory, the disintegration energy filling in the vacuum area is not a regular and balanced increase, but in some areas show some higher than average indicators, so I think there must be something emitting disintegration energy to cause such a result.

Theoretically, the speed at which the vacuum area is filled with decay energy again is erratic. However, some areas were filling faster than average. The reason for this is that some things were dissipating the decay energy.
